content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Create Collection using
mongosh
There are 2 ways to create a collection.
Method 1
You can create a collection using the
createCollection()
database method.
Example
db.createCollection("posts")

Method 2
You can also create a collection during the
insert
process.
Example
We are here assuming
object
is a valid JavaScript object containing post data:
db.posts.insertOne(object)

This will create the "posts" collection if it does not already exist.
Remember:
In MongoDB, a collection is not actually created until it gets content!

★
+1
